name: Black Hole The Game
description:
You are Lovecraft-1890, a somehow sentient and very hungry black hole that for some reason is capable of moving through the fabric of space and time. Being a hungry sentient black hole, you would want to eat everything in your path and just about anything is going to provide you sustenance. However, the Amidst Us, a group of giant celestials in funny looking box suits and is 100% in no way a copy of a very notable funny space man group want to stop you from growing bigger! You don't want that!  Eat everything you can so that you can grow bigger while avoiding the Amidst Us!

How to play
Just move the mouse to move Lovecraft.
Careful not to let the Amidst Us find you or they'll remove one heart from your health.
Find hearts around Space to fill your health again.
Eat as much objects within the given time as you can!
